overview_of_class: This course explores the applications of seismology to studying earthquakes and their relation to plate tectonics: focal mechanisms, waveform modeling, earthquake geodesy, earthquake recurrence and hazards,plate motions and plate boundary processes are also included.
name: Earthquakes and Tectonics
title: WCAS EARTH 324-0-01 Earthquakes and Tectonics
